J"'3(7 jsi) From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 28th January 1920.^TAZ\Z^^^ (Received 30th.) ^^^^^^ 1181. Intelligence Officer, Bajgiran, wires 25th January that troops from centre 2 passed Askabad for Krasnovodsk front, average rate of 2,000 weekly. Large numbers v of Q.F. guns and modern technical apparatus of all sorts gone through. Many ex-officers are with new troops, whose morale and training are said to be good.
